title: User Signup Success Flow
description: Verify that a new user can successfully sign up with valid details and receives an email confirmation link.

steps.description: Navigate to the signup page.
Input valid user details (email, password, etc).
Submit the signup form.
Verify account is created and email confirmation prompt is shown.
Open the email and click the confirmation link.
Verify the user account is confirmed and can log in.

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Check that a registered user can log in successfully with correct credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid username/email and password.
Click the login button.
Verify successful login redirects to the dashboard.

title: User Login with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify login fails when provided with incorrect username/email or password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid username/email or password.
Click the login button.
Verify error message is displayed and login is denied.

title: Password Reset Flow
description: Verify the password reset flow including request, email receipt, and password update.

steps.description: Navigate to the forgot password page.
Enter registered email and submit password reset request.
Verify that a password reset email is sent.
Open the password reset email and click the reset link.
Enter and confirm new valid password.
Verify password is updated and user can log in with new password.

title: Create and Join Household Group
description: Validate that users can create new household groups and join existing ones successfully.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to the household management page.
Create a new household by entering required details.
Verify the household group is created and user is added as a member.
Log out and log in as another user.
Join the existing household by entering household invite or code.
Verify user is added to the household members list with appropriate permissions.

title: Add, Edit, and Delete Chores
description: Verify chores can be added with all details, edited, and deleted correctly with UI reflecting changes.

steps.description: Navigate to chores page.
Add a new chore, providing all required fields and assigning to members.
Verify the new chore appears in the chore list with correct details.
Edit the chore details and save.
Verify edited details are correctly saved and displayed.
Delete the chore.
Verify the chore is removed from the list.

title: Assign and Complete Chores with Notifications
description: Check that chores can be assigned to household members, completed with optional photo/note, and notifications are sent.

steps.description: Create a chore and assign to a specific household member.
Verify the assigned member receives a notification.
Assigned member marks the chore as completed with a photo and note.
Verify chore status updates to completed and notifications are sent to household members.

title: Add and Split Expense Equally
description: Verify expenses can be logged and split equally among household members with payment status tracked.

steps.description: Navigate to expenses page.
Add a new expense with relevant details and select equal split option.
Verify the expense appears with equal shares assigned to members.
Update payment status for one or more members.
Verify payment status updates are saved and reflected in balances.

title: Add and Split Expense with Custom Amounts
description: Verify expenses can be split with custom amounts per member and reflected correctly in the dashboard balances.

steps.description: Add a new expense and select custom split option.
Input individual amounts for each member.
Verify total sum matches expense total and splits are saved.
Verify member balances update accordingly on the dashboard.

title: Expense Filtering and Detail Viewing
description: Check expense list can be filtered by date, category, and payment status, and detailed expense info is accessible.

steps.description: Navigate to the expense list.
Apply filters such as date range, categories, and payment status.
Verify the expense list updates accordingly.
Select an expense to view detailed information in a dialog.
Verify all relevant data (splits, notes, attachments) are displayed correctly.

title: Dashboard Displays Accurate Summaries
description: Verify that the dashboard shows correct and updated summaries of chores, expenses, member balances, and notifications.

steps.description: Perform updates like adding chores and expenses.
Navigate to the dashboard page.
Verify chores, expenses, and balances displayed reflect the recent changes accurately.
Verify notification counts and recent activities are shown correctly.

title: In-App Communication on Chores and Expenses
description: Validate that users can add comments on chores and expenses and receive timely in-app notifications.

steps.description: Open a chore or expense detail view.
Add a comment to the item.
Verify comment is saved and visible to all household members.
Open the app as another household member.
Verify in-app notification for the new comment is received.

title: Profile Management Update
description: Check that users can update their profile settings and changes are synchronized across devices.

steps.description: Navigate to the user profile settings.
Make updates to user settings such as display name, avatar, or preferences.
Save the changes.
Verify changes are saved and displayed correctly.
Verify updated profile is reflected on another logged-in device.

title: PWA Offline Support Functional Test
description: Ensure that the app supports offline functionality and data entered offline syncs correctly when back online.

steps.description: Load the app and go offline using network throttling tools.
Try to add chores and expenses while offline.
Verify app accepts inputs without errors and provides feedback about offline mode.
Reconnect network.
Verify offline data syncs properly to the backend and updates reflect on other devices.

title: Push Notifications Delivery
description: Verify push notifications for chores and expenses updates are delivered properly and user interactions behave as expected.

steps.description: Assign a chore or log an expense that triggers a notification.
Verify push notifications are received on user devices.
Click on the notification.
Verify app opens to the relevant chore or expense detail.

title: Error Boundary Handling Test
description: Check that the app gracefully catches runtime errors and displays error boundaries without crashing the page.

steps.description: Simulate runtime error in a component (e.g. chore list).
Verify the app displays a user-friendly error boundary message.
Verify app remains responsive and no blank or broken UI is shown.

title: Payment Tracking and Settlement
description: Verify that payments between household members can be tracked, marked as settled, and reflected in balances.

steps.description: Navigate to payments page.
Record a payment made by one member to another.
Verify payment record appears with correct details.
Mark payment as settled.
Verify balances update accordingly on expense and dashboard views.

title: Household Member Permissions Enforcement
description: Ensure that operations such as editing household settings and chores are restricted based on member permissions.

steps.description: Log in as a member with limited permissions.
Attempt to perform admin-level actions like deleting household or assigning chores to others.
Verify such actions are blocked and appropriate error or warning messages are displayed.

title: Session Security and Timeout
description: Verify that user sessions expire after a period of inactivity and require re-authentication.

steps.description: Log in and remain idle beyond session timeout period.
Attempt to perform an action after timeout.
Verify the user is logged out or prompted to log in again.

title: Form Validation and Error Handling
description: Validate form inputs across the app enforce required fields, proper formats, and display meaningful error messages.

steps.description: Try to submit signup, chore creation, expense entry, and profile update forms with missing or invalid data.
Verify errors are shown inline with clear messages and submission is blocked.
Correct inputs and resubmit forms.
Verify forms submit successfully and no errors remain.
